entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
